title: Made in Korea: The K-Pop Experience
overview: Made in Korea: The K-Pop Experience is a music experiment like no other. The series follows five boys from across the UK as they are put through the K-pop training process with the goal of launching a new boy band on the global stage.Cameras go behind closed doors at SM Entertainment for the first time to witness the band working with the world's greatest choreographers, singing songs from the best songwriters, and being tutored by some of the most revered experts in the K-pop business.
